resources.string: insert the player\'\s name and press "add" to add a new player. Do it as many times as players you want to add. Press "ready" when you finished adding all the players
Insert the description of the new challenge and it\'\s value. Do it as many times as challenges you want to add. Press "ready" when you finished adding all the challenges
Welcome! Before start playing, add as many players as you want.\n If you want, you can add personalized challenges too.\n Press start when you are ready
